params.jsonBase: {"cnd":"[participant].[Participant].[id] = ?", "prepQuery":{"query":"SELECT [participant].[Participant].id AS [participantId], CONCAT_WS(' ',[humans].[Human].lastName, [humans].[Human].middleName, [humans].[Human].firstName) AS [Participant] FROM [participant].[Participant] INNER JOIN [humans].[Human] ON [participant].[Participant].humanId = [humans].[Human].id ORDER BY [humans].[Human].lastName"}}

onChange.script:
embSec = self.getSibling("EmbeddedView_Rooms")
	#system.perspective.print(('before embSec.props.params.jsonIn: ',embSec.props.params.jsonIn))
	
	# Convert 2nd view jsonBase to python collection
	secPyIn = system.util.jsonDecode(embSec.props.params.jsonIn)
	
	# Convert 1st view jsonOut to python collection
	primPyOut = system.util.jsonDecode(currentValue.value)
	
	# Set 2nd view jsonIn node 'args' to array containing value 
	# from 1st view jsonOut node 'args'  
	# Do job in python collection then convert to json
	secPyIn['wherePlus'] = primPyOut['wherePlus'] 
	
	
	embSec.props.params.jsonIn = system.util.jsonEncode(secPyIn)
	
	#system.perspective.print(('after embSec.props.params.jsonIn: ',embSec.props.params.jsonIn))

params.jsonBase: {"cnd":"[lodging].[Facility].[id] = ?", "prepQuery":{"query":"SELECT [id] AS [facilityID], [facilityName] AS [Facility] FROM [RITIOps].[lodging].[Facility] WHERE timeRetired IS NULL ORDER BY facilityName"}}

onChange.script:
embSec = self.getSibling("EmbeddedView_Beds")

	#system.perspective.print(('before embSec.props.params.jsonIn: ',embSec.props.params.jsonIn))
	
	# Convert 2nd view jsonBase to python collection
	secPyIn = system.util.jsonDecode(embSec.props.params.jsonIn)
	
	# Convert 1st view jsonOut to python collection
	primPyOut = system.util.jsonDecode(currentValue.value)
	
	# Set 2nd view jsonIn node 'args' to array containing value 
	# from 1st view jsonOut node 'args'  
	# Do job in python collection then convert to json
	secPyIn['wherePlus'] = primPyOut['wherePlus'] 
	
	
	embSec.props.params.jsonIn = system.util.jsonEncode(secPyIn)
	
	#system.perspective.print(('after embSec.props.params.jsonIn: ',embSec.props.params.jsonIn))

params.jsonBase: {"cnd":"[lodging].[Room].[id] = ?", "prepQuery":{"query":"SELECT [Room].[id] [roomId],[roomName] AS [Room] FROM [RITIOps].[lodging].[Room] WHERE facilityId =  ? ORDER BY roomName "}}

{"cnd":"[lodging].[Bed].[id] = ?", "prepQuery":{"args":[45],"query":"SELECT  [id] AS [bedId],[bedName] AS [Bed] FROM [RITIOps].[lodging].[Bed] WHERE  timeRetired IS NULL AND roomId = ? ORDER BY [id]"}}

messageHandlers.script:
# implement your handler here
	#payload = {'reservationId':reservationId, 'bedId':bedId, 'participantId':participantId, 'roomId':roomId
	if (self.getChild("EmbeddedView Facility").position.display ):
		self.getChild("EmbeddedView Facility").props.params.SelectedValue = int(payload['facilityId'])
	self.view.params.reservationId = payload['reservationId']
	self.getChild("EmbeddedView Participant").props.params.SelectedValue = int(payload['participantId'])
	self.getChild("EmbeddedView Room").props.params.SelectedValue = int(payload['roomId'])
	self.getChild("EmbeddedView Bed").props.params.SelectedValue = int(payload['bedId'])
